title: A message about Professor Marcy’s resignation (University of California - Berkeley)
text: ( Source : University of California - Berkeley ) UC Berkeley Chancellor Nicholas Dirks and Executive Vice Chancellor and Provost Claude Steele sent out this message today (Wednesday, Oct. 14 ): Dear Campus Community , This morning Professor of
